Author: Microsoft Developer
Description:
Tired of jumping between workspaces to find your data? Discover how OneLake Catalog Explorer provides a unified view for all your Microsoft Fabric items. In this episode, we walk through how to navigate your entire data estate with ease. Learn how to leverage personalized filters to cut through the noise, evaluate trust signals to ensure data quality without losing your place, and take immediate action: from refreshing datasets to managing permissions, all within a single interface.
